main.name: Adriana Valdiglesias
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: I am a Passionate Full Stack Web Developer leveraging a background customer service. I'm knowledgeable in user interface, testing, and debugging processes. Effective at combining creativity and problem solving to develop user-friendly applications. I am proactive self-starter dedicated to continued learning. Experience developing software independently and within a team. Willingness to navigate ambiguous tasks, find suitable solutions and seek help/advice where appropriate. A positive contributor recognized for effective communication and organization abilities.
main.contactmessage: Interest in collaborating? or would like to simply reach me?

education.school: University of Connecticut school of Engineering
education.description: Intensive boot camp program focused on gaining technical programming and market-driven skills

work.title: Founder and CEO
work.description: Cloning all the apps possible. On the way to clone the world! Building the PAPA Fam as large as possible.

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
